short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blacklist sites and enhance your productivity on the internet!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Afraid of how much of your time gets eaten up by Instagram, Tiktok and news sites? 
The Productivity Booster let's you create rules for these culprits.

Make yourself aware by giving unproductive websites a red frame. Redirect yourself to productive websites after a certain time. Set yourself up for better browsing habits!
